author: Compton Boodhoo
comment: I've been using the Android wear app for almost a year but I've never tried the phone version, maybe it's new? I think it's incredible, even the free visualizers make this a must download for me. I'm going to be purchasing a pack or two soon.  Both the phone version on my Galaxy S8+ and the Android wear version on my Huawei Watch are incredibly smooth and accurate. The app feels very polished and oddly pleasing with its smooth graphics. I'm not exaggerating about how good it looks on Android wear, no other app other custom watch faces work as smooth or look as nice. On my giant Galaxy S8 plus, Full screen mode is nice and I plan to use it a lot to show off.

author: Jacob Haig
comment: 95% of the faces must be purchased. But there is lot of customization. The author of this app would profit from being a little more lose with paying for that faces. Personally, I uninstalled immediately after seeing all of the purchaseable faces.

author: Ziv Taylor
comment: I hate this scam! I bought all the effects yesterday and today they're all gone and it says I have to buy them again!!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Hi Ziv, be sure to not block internet permission because it is needed to verify and check that the pack has been bought in order to unlock everything. You can also try to reboot your device, launch the playstore, and then launch the app. Hope this will help!

author: Jaymz See
comment: Love it so far. I just wish it had the option for camera orbit around some of the 3D spectrums.

comment: Having trouble. Will not connect to my Gear 3 Frontier any suggestions?

comment: So greed more than ea

author: Enrikes12 !
comment: The title of this app says "free." But when you download it. It has In-app purchases.

author: Tom Sutherland
comment: I don't know why this has such poor ratings, it's a pretty cool app!

author: Piotr Wolny
comment: Some effect are fantastic. I miss only  "favorites" functionality. Worth every Penny anyway.

author: Tom Crimmins
comment: Fun free App.   Great when going out.  better then a flashlight or glow stick.

comment: Nice app. How can I display the text?

comment: Totaly cancer curing. 10 out of 10. Love watching it. Much hypnotizing. 60fps.

comment: Neto dig it

comment: Good app for Android wear

author: Prototype SMG
comment: You get the crappy visualizers instead of the quality stuff. Way to go devs for driving away people from your app! Sometimes people want quality over quantity(being money). We understand you want money but we want convenience. This app is retarded. Dont download unless you want visuals you can get off of an Xbox 360 mp3.
title: Crappy

author: Brendan McCoy
comment: Love this visualizer app! It's fun to just mess with when you're bored. Everything about it is great. If it supported visualizing music playing off my phone, it'd be perfect
title: Super fun

comment: Got premium immediately despite no updates because this app is amazing

author: Sponge Bob
comment: Probably one of about 5 wear apps that are actually worth bothering to pay for
title: Great

comment: This app is great....thanks guys.  BTW, the app is for wear not phones. Or at least that's what is says, so don't give it a bad review because it won't work on your phone.

author: L. O.
comment: If you want to turn your wrist into a psychedelic universe that grooves to the beat, then this mofo is a must have!  I'll be setting my watch to full brightness and blinding people with its awesomeness at raves and music festivals.

comment: The apps does not work, try to use in my cell samsung galaxy note 3.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Hey Pedro, how about retrying this app, phone support and many features have been added in the meantime. Hope you will like it, thanks!

reply.content: Major updates have been pushed in the meantime, you could give it another chance, thanks!

title: Doesn't launch.

author: Michael Zhonga
comment: Love this app!! Any plans to put the full version on the Amazon app store? Great work!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you. Very low probability to be on the Amazon app store because they do not ship the "Android Wear" app to sync your wearable with your device (most of people with a smartwatch already have the Play Store).

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Hi Erik, major updates have been pushed in the meantime, I was never able to reproduce this issue but added a mechanism preventing AWV from running if not visible. Hope it works for you now!
